sentences.sentence: Inhibitor of leukotriene A4 hydrolase and of enkephalin degradation in cell preparations from brain.
sentences.translation: 白三烯a 4水解酶和脑细胞降解产生的脑啡肽的抑制剂。

sentences.sentence: The leukotriene modifiers are the drugs that treats almost all the symptoms of allergic rhinitis.
sentences.translation: 白三烯调节剂的药物治疗几乎所有的过敏性鼻炎的症状。

sentences.sentence: Objective to explore the clinical significance of urinary leukotriene E4 (LTE4) detection in children with respiratory syncytial virus bronchiolitis (RSV).
sentences.translation: 目的探讨呼吸道合胞病毒(RSV)毛细支气管炎患儿尿白三烯e4 (LTE4)测定的临床意义。
